pullrequest.title: catkinize drcsim with new atlas model (catkin drcsim 3.1.0 candidate)

content.raw: The original way of duplication required some modification, e.g. comment out any functionality and references to `gazebo_msgs`.  Also, include path for some headers had to be changed.  A cleaner way to duplicate code now that everything is catkinized, we can simply copy the entire groovy-devel source as-is into drcsim repo?
content.html: The original way of duplication required some modification, e.g. comment out any functionality and references to gazebo_msgs. Also, include path for some headers had to be changed. A cleaner way to duplicate code now that everything is catkinized, we can simply copy the entire groovy-devel source as-is into drcsim repo?
